question_text: \(\begin{array}{c|c} \text{Scores} & 3 & 6 & 5 & 2 \\ \hline \text{Frequency} & 2 & 3 & 4 & 6 \end{array}\)From the table above, find the median.
subject: mathematics
explanation: Mean = \(\frac{(2 \times 3) + (3 \times 6) + (4 \times 5) + (2 \times 6)}{2 + 3 + 4 + 6}\) = \(\frac{6 + 18 + 20 + 12}{15}\) = \(\frac{56}{15}\)  = 3.73 Median: Arrange numbers in ascending order from smallest to biggest to get: 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 5, 5, 5, 5, 6, 6, 6. The middle number is the 8th number which is 3.

question_text: The curved surface area of a cylinder 5cm high is 110cm2. Find the radius of its base π = \(\frac{22}{7}\)
subject: mathematics
explanation: Curved surface area of cylinder = 2πrh 110 = 2 × \(\frac{22}{7}\) × r × 5 r = \(\frac{110 \times 7}{44 \times 5}\) = 3.5cm

question_text: Make S the subject of the relation p = s + \(\frac{sm^2}{nr}\)
subject: mathematics
explanation: p = s + \(\frac{sm^2}{nr}\) p = s + ( 1 + \(\frac{m^2}{nr}\)) p = s (1 + \(\frac{nr + m^2}{nr}\)) nr × p = s (nr + m2) s = \(\frac{nrp}{nr + m^2}\)

question_text: A number of pencils were shared out among Bisi, Sola and Tunde in the ratio of 2 : 3 : 5 respectively. If Bisi got 5, how many were share out?
subject: mathematics
explanation: Let x r3epresent total number of pencils shared B : S : T = 2 + 3 + 5 = 10 2 : 3 : 5 = \(\frac{2}{10}\) x y  = 5 2y =5 2y = 50 ∴ y = \(\frac{50}{2}\)  = 25

question_text: The scores of 16 students in a Mathematics test are 65, 65, 55, 60, 60, 65, 60, 70, 75, 70, 65, 70, 60, 65, 65, 70. What is the sum of the median and modal scores?
subject: mathematics
explanation: \(\begin{array}{c|c} Scores & Frequency \\\hline 55 & 1\\ 60 & 4\\ 65 & 6\\ 70 & 4\\ 75 & 1 \end{array}\) Median = 65(middle number) Mode = 65(most common) Median + Mode = 65 + 65 = 130

question_text: In the diagram MN is a chord of a circle KMN centre O and radius 10cm. If < MON = 140o, find, correct to the nearest cm, the length of the chord MN.
subject: mathematics
explanation: From the diagramsin 70o = \(\frac{x}{10}\)x = 10sin 70o= 9.3969Hence, length of chord MN = 2x= 2 x 9.3969= 18.7938= 19cm (nearest cm)
